text: Bernard Joseph McLaughlin (November 19, 1912 - January 5, 2015) was an American Bishop of the Roman Catholic Church to Buffalo, New York. He was the second oldest American Bishop behind Peter Leo Gerety of Trenton, New Jersey.Bernard Joseph McLaughlin McLaughlin died at the age of 102 in Buffalo, New York. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:People from Buffalo, New York Category:American Roman Catholic bishops
